name: Daily Exchange Rates Newsletter
description:
Get real-time currency updates delivered straight to your inbox with this automated exchange rate newsletter template. This automation pulls the latest rates for your preferred currency pairs, such as the popular USD/EUR, USD/JPY, GBP/USD, and sends them via email in a clean, easy-to-read format. Stay informed on market fluctuations without the hassle of manual checks.

You can also expand this automation by saving daily rates to a spreadsheet or database, providing an ongoing record of exchange trends. Perfect for analysts, accountants, and businesses that rely on precise currency data. Just customize the automation to your needs and keep your currency tracking streamlined and effortless!

Source: [European Central Bank](https://www.ecb.europa.eu/stats/policy_and_exchange_rates/euro_reference_exchange_rates/html/index.en.html)
